title: 109_s1976
content: Iran Nonproliferation Enforcement Act of 2005 - Amends the Iran Nonproliferation Act of 2000 to: (1) make sanctions mandatory, and impose a minimum two-year sanction. (2) subject controlling and subsidiary companies of a foreign person to sanctions. (3) expand sanctions to include prohibitions on US investment, financing, and financial assistance. And (4) expand the justification requirements for a presidential national security waiver of sanctions.
